function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of self-isolation when showing covid-19-like symptoms","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large public events with more than 100 participants","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing and non-essential contact","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of lockdown measures and restrictions on social interaction","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid escalation of interventions by european governments","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inaccurate model predictions leading to ineffective interventions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Incomplete or biased data used for modeling","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implicit lag in time affecting intervention impact on deaths","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Bias in model due to inclusion of deaths from non-locally acquired infections","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Deriving ifr from assumptions about homogeneous attack rates across age-groups","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate country-specific estimates of attack rate by age","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assumption of independent random times for the incubation period and time between onset of symptoms and death","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty in infection model","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate handling of serial interval distribution","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Country-specific reproduction number variability","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases due to non-pharmaceutical interventions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate estimation of reproduction number due to prior assumptions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate preparation for initial seeding of infections","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of hamiltonian monte carlo hmc sampler","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lag between deaths and infections in data interpretation","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Slowing of rt in response to major interventions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in daily deaths due to covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sensitivity of estimates to serial interval distribution","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implausible uninformative prior distributions on intervention effects","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for different lengths of epidemic in european countries","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of nonparametric function with a gaussian process prior distribution","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large gatherings allowed without restrictions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to implement school closures","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Individuals with symptoms not staying at home","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large gatherings and public events","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing and travel restrictions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Traveling and non-necessary social contacts advised against by health directive.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Nationwide school closures ordered in various countries.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Public events banned and lockdowns ordered in multiple countries.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of self-isolation measures for individuals with cough or fever symptoms","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of interventions on contagious disease spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complex mathematical model","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on parameter values","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on historical data","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of active travel and physical activity leading to increased risk of obesity and chronic diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased risk of infectious diseases in built environments with low walkability and active travel infrastructure","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction in physical activity due to limitations on access to destinations","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to detect statistically significant relationships between built environment measures and covid-19 infection and mortality rates due to fluid and rapidly evolving nature of covid-19 data.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for the connections between community design, sustainability, and public health, leading to inadequate infecction and chronic disease management strategies.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Influence of physical environment on behavior and exposures leading to increased risk of disease transmission and chronic conditions.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure effects of the environment may directly impact infection","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unreliable estimates of infection rates due to testing variations and early data collection","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulties in detecting relationships between physical environments, exposures, behaviors, and health outcomes","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for increased covid-19 spread due to lack of social distancing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the impact of built environment on covid-19 transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"}]}
